meanings.definition: The act or process of rotating automatically.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, the wind caused the autorotations of the windmill blades.
meanings.sent2: The autorotations of the Earth around the sun create the changing seasons.
meanings.sent3: The autorotations of the ceiling fan made the room feel cooler.
meanings.sent4: The autorotations of the carousel horses gave the illusion of movement.
meanings.sent5: The autorotations of the propeller helped the airplane stay in the air.

meanings.definition: A maneuver performed by helicopters to safely land in the event of engine failure.
meanings.sent1: The pilot skillfully executed autorotations to safely land the helicopter.
meanings.sent2: Helicopter pilots practice autorotations regularly to be prepared for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: During the airshow, the helicopter pilot showcased autorotations as part of the performance.
meanings.sent4: The autorotations of the helicopter blades were a graceful sight against the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: Passengers felt relieved when the pilot smoothly performed autorotations during the emergency landing.
